snippet.title: The Gardens Between - Teaser - Out now: Nintendo Switch, PS4, XBOX One, Steam, Mac App Store
snippet.description:
The Gardens Between is out now on Nintendo Switch, Playstation 4, Steam (PC, Mac), XBOX One and Mac App Store℠! More info at http://thegardensbetween.com

Best friends Arina and Frendt fall into a series of vibrant, dreamlike island gardens peppered with everyday objects from their childhood. Together they embark on an emotional journey that examines the significance of their friendship: the memories they’ve built, what must be let go, and what should never be left behind. 

Lost in a mysterious realm where cause and effect are malleable, the friends find that time flows in all directions. Manipulate time to solve puzzles and reach the apex of each isle. Follow the duo as they unpack and explore their significant moments spent together, lighting up constellations and illuminating threads of a bittersweet narrative.


Available on the eShop for Nintendo Switch at:
http://nintendo.com/games/detail/the-gardens-between-switch

Available on the Steam Store for PC, Mac, Linux at:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/600990/The_Gardens_Between

Available on the Mac App Store for Mac OS X at:
http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/the-gardens-between/id1373575045

Available now on PlayStation 4 at:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP4266-CUSA10848_00-GARDENSBETWEEN00

Available now on XBOX One at:
https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/the-gardens-between/9p4z4tw66lpv


© Valve Corporation 2018. Steam and the Steam Logo and trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Valve Corporation in the US and other countries.
The "PS" Family logo and "PS4" are registered trademarks of Sony Interactive Entertainment Inc.
© Nintendo 2018. Nintendo Switch is a trademark of Nintendo.
© 2018 The Voxel Agents.
App Store is a service mark of Apple Inc.
